programme.title: Broker
programme.desc: Boxes are left out for people to anonymously drop off their unwanted babies.

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Roofer Simon is critically injured from a two-storey fall onto concrete. While 97-year-old Doris is in Resus with a worryingly fast and irregular heart rate, 20-month-old Evelyn has burnt her finger on a mozzarella stick.

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Steven has life-threatening injuries after a 22-foot wall collapsed on him at work and buried him beneath. Coby has crashed his motocross bike at speed. And seven-year-old Layla-Rose has fallen off her bike and smashed her front teeth.

programme.title: American Pickers

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: Come Dine with Me: The Professionals
programme.desc: In Bristol, first to host are Kirsty and Tamsin at their Mexican restaurant Dalia Cucina. Second to host are Neil and Paulo from Mediterranean restaurant Bambalan. The final night sees Jeanette and Jaida from vegan Caribbean restaurant Fi Real host.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: In Lincoln, Kirstie and Phil help Carly and Eric end their five-year debate over their two-bed bungalow. But with the pair going off-piste, will they love or list it?

programme.title: Jasmine Harmans Renovation in the Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine gets stuck in with the renovation. All seems to be going well... until a medical emergency puts everything on hold, and Jasmines mum Vasoulla comes to the rescue!

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Leah Charles-King is flying to the countryside of inland Valencia province in Spain to help James and Laura find a permanent home. With their maximum budget of £90,000, Leah shows them five great properties.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Best friends of 45 years Sally and Leonie want to buy a holiday house together on Spains Costa Dorada for £280k. Will a place with a secret James Bond basement be for their eyes only?

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: In Cowbridge, Amy and Louis need help with a home that, on the surface, looks picture perfect, but its dysfunctional layout has made Amy long for pastures new. Louis believes Kirstie can come up with a plan to turn it into a forever family home.

programme.title: Britains Most Expensive Houses

programme.title: Come Dine with Me: The Professionals
programme.desc: The pros head to Cardiff, where Sam and Gary of Mexican taco restaurant La Pantera get the competition going. Heather and Gareth from steak house The Gate are up next. Then its Sian and Joel from country pub The Horse.

programme.title: Grand Designs

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: An English butlers professional and emotional life is examined retrospectively during a journey towards a reunion with the housekeeper he loved years before. programme.title: Scam Interceptors
programme.sub-title: We Have Eyes on the Scammers
programme.desc: Ethical hacker Jim Browning has hacked into a scam call centres CCTV system, so Nick and the team can watch as the scammers pretend to be mobile phone firm O2. Theyve locked on to a woman in north London, offering her a free SIM card upgrade, but in fact all they are trying to do is order themselves an expensive new phone and bill her for it. The only chance of intercepting both her and the scammers in time lies with our ground team.

programme.title: Lost and Found in the Lakes
programme.desc: Revealing the epic clean-up that took place alongside our search for treasured items as the team remove and recycle dangerous items from all over the Lake District.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Alistair Appleton is in the Highlands of Scotland with an artistic couple whose aspirations include starting their own music festival among the magnificent mountains the region is famous for. Alistair also visits an ambitious rewilding project which hopes to restore the once vast Caledonian Forest.

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Crawley to convert Lamar and Nadines overgrown, weed-filled, south-facing garden into a tropical social garden. They would love the garden to draw on their combined Jamaican and Myanmar heritage, as well as Sri Lanka, so its an eclectic mix of semi-tropical planting, socialising spaces and a central cooking area where all the action would take place. Can the team achieve all of this on a £5,000 budget?

programme.title: The Inner Circle

While in the region, Nicki drops in on show jumping legend and double Olympic gold medallist Nick Skelton and his sons, Harry and Dan, who are following in their fathers hoof steps.

programme.title: Garden Rescue

programme.title: The Inner Circle

programme.title: Pointless

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: As Mobeens investigation deepens, it becomes clearer that illicit relationships between prisoners and jail staff are just the tip of the iceberg. The bigger story involves organised criminal gangs determined to cash in on a lucrative prison drug economy. When news breaks of a prison governor being jailed for a relationship with a drug-dealing gang boss, Mobeen becomes determined to uncover the true extent of criminal influence inside our prisons.

A year of twists, turns and damning revelations pulls back the curtain on a dangerous wider world of coercion, corruption and contraband thriving behind bars.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: Chris and Amelia are in Barnsley to transform Rea and her daughter Indias bland and unsafe patch into a boho-style garden influenced by their love of upcycling, crafting and all things rustic. India would love a fairy area, while mum Rea wants a space to relax in and socialise with friends. Can the team achieve all this on a £5,000 budget?

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Dion has the same thoughts as the new owners at an end terrace in Cheshire. Martin struggles to get through the front door in Warwickshire, and Martel feels very much at home in Perthshire.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Its an exciting week at Longmeadow as Monty makes a start on his new woodland garden. Advolly Richmond looks at the history of Gertrude Jekyll, and Carol Klein revels in the displays at RHS Rosemoor.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: The Finish Line
programme.desc: Roman Kemp and sidekick Sarah Greene host the quiz show where contestants race on moving podiums across the studio floor. Correct answers get the players moving, while wrong answers will stop them in their tracks.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: John, Kelly, Aimee and Ricky battle it out to see which one of them is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Top British chefs originating from various regions across the UK compete to produce a menu that is served at a prestigious banquet for special events and prominent guests.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: The peregrine falcon is the fastest animal on earth, it can reach speeds of over 200mph. Renowned bird handler Lloyd Buck puts his peregrines to the test with the help of state-of-the-art technology and leading avian scientists.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Paul Martin presents from Reading in Berkshire, where experts Anita Manning and David Harper scour the crowd to find objects to take to auction. Anita gets excited over a large Victorian gold and garnet pendant, and David has some fun with a 1930s toy airplane.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Every day this week, celebrity contestants Krishnan Guru-Murthy, Megan McCubbin, Ashley Storrie and Adam Woodyatt take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman. A daily winner is declared following a quickfire round at the end of each show, and the scores are tallied across the week, resulting in an overall champion being crowned on Friday.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Janette Manrara dishes up all the action from the world of Strictly Come Dancing. Plus more exclusives at how the couples are getting on in the training room, and costume designer Vicky Gill has a sneak peek at some of the weekends outfits.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Eighties pop stars and married couple Martin and Shirlie Kemp are on the road with Margie Cooper and James Braxton for a tour of the West Country in an Aston Martin and a Ferrari.

programme.title: Highland Cops
programme.desc: Police are alerted to the discovery of human remains near Aviemore. They suspect this might be the last resting place of Rodrigo Falcon, a popular barman who went missing in December 2022. Sergeant Stephen Todd and his team confront a woman who is keeping monkeys and tropical animals in a ruined house in freezing cold Caithness. In Inverness, PC Siobhan Cooper faces rowdy bank holiday crowds.

programme.title: The Ridge
programme.desc: Mia questions Teddy and Harry, with conflicting results. An arson attempt fuels Mias suspicions that she is not welcome. The realisation that she hardly knew Cassy draws Mia closer to Ewan.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: In St Agnes, the crew are involved in a race against time to rescue two young men. They are reported to be struggling in the water near a notorious headland known as Tubbys Head.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: All the finalists join Ed Gamble for their exclusive first interviews, fresh from a staggering final episode. They discuss the nail-biting endgame and reflect on their full castle experiences. Claudia Winkleman also joins Ed to digest the first UK celebrity series and give her thoughts on this years players.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Space
programme.desc: After the fall of the Soviet Union, a crown jewel of communism still survives: the Soviet space station, Mir, a final outpost of a fallen empire. But the countrys space program is fighting for survival, and the US government is concerned that Russian rocket scientists, with their valuable nuclear knowledge, might be recruited by rogue states. America responds to this situation with the Shuttle-Mir Programme: US astronauts train in Russia and live aboard Mir for months at a time.

programme.title: How Are You? Its Alan (Partridge)
programme.desc: Newly single and never happier, Alan throws himself into new experiences to see if trying fresh things can improve our wellbeing. He finds joy in the unexpected.

programme.title: Dragons Den
programme.desc: The pitches include a high-impact events business, natural tattoo aftercare, a platform that turns screen time into learning time and a safety-first flat-sharing app.

programme.title: Global Eye
programme.desc: Bringing forensic journalism from all corners of the world by BBC Eye, the World Services critically acclaimed investigative unit, and featuring expert global correspondents getting to the heart of the biggest international stories.

programme.title: The Crash Detectives
programme.desc: A road worker is hit by a modified car during a police pursuit. However, when the driver fails to stop, the race is on to track the car down and bring the offender to justice.

But the rules exist in your head - its about how you think, not just what you think about.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.desc: Freddie and Mum paint colourful dinosaur eggs and organise a tricky treasure hunt for brother George. Will George use his dino knowledge to find all of the hidden eggs and dinosaurs?

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Balthazar is in the kitchen cooking a traditional Turkish revani cake, helped by his sister Serena and brother Ted. Coconut is a really important ingredient in his recipe, as it is put in the cake as well as on top. Balthazar invites his friends to taste the coconut before he cooks it, but they dont like it very much. He thinks hell change their minds when they taste his finished cake.

programme.title: Teeny Tiny Creatures

Chantelle and Rorys fact files help answer all of Carlsons questions.

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: The class is making fruit kebabs, so they go on a trip to a local supermarket to buy the ingredients. Will Leon be able to find his favourite fruit - a big melon?

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines

programme.title: Yakka Dee

programme.title: Numberblocks

programme.title: Colourblocks

programme.title: Hey Duggee

programme.title: Yukee

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: As New Year approaches, the gang make a pact to celebrate at Monica and Rachels flat without bringing any dates. However, as the New Year gets closer, all of them find themselves breaking that promise except for Ross, who brings along his new pet monkey Marcel.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Murr, Sal, and Q learn a hard lesson about being kind to food service professionals, before heading off to give rock solid relationship advice; the losing joker is in for a shock, as his punishment is led by Colin Jost.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Debra are excited to have finally met a couple, Neil and Lauren, who are just like them. Ray starts having mixed feelings though when their son Spencer wreaks havoc around the Barone household.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert think he has finally found the one in Angela. Shes an international-trade lawyer whos bright, speaks four languages, clearly loves Robert, and seems too good to be true.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Marie visits an optician and winds up with a pair of glasses just in time for the holidays. Unfortunately, she ends up putting the whole family on edge when she starts seeing them for better and for worse.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Frank must make amends with his granddaughter, Ally, when she catches him stealing food at the supermarket.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike decides to take the fall for a mob scandal in order to protect the mayor and his administration; Caitlin and Mike finally sleep together.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike takes the fall for a mob scandal to protect the mayor and his administration; he says goodbye to the city and his job as deputy mayor.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: The new deputy mayor Charlie Crawford assumes his duties; Caitlin works to prevent a strike by tollbooth workers.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Charlie needs to find a new dentist for the mayor before a photoshoot; Caitlin hires a new assistant; Stuart and Carter deal with a parking spot thief.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys New Brain
programme.desc: Joey accidentally informs a cast member that she will be fired so that his character will get her characters brain, and Ross plans a surprise for Monica and Chandlers wedding - he wants to play the bagpipes.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Truth About London
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler fondly reminisce about London until a startling revelation leaves Chandler floored. Meanwhile, Rachel teaches Ben practical jokes to play on Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Cheap Wedding Dress
programme.desc: Monica regrets telling a fellow bride-to-be about a cheaper bridal shop, and later she has to fight the woman tooth and nail for a unique wedding dress before competing with her to hire Chandlers favourite band for the night. Meanwhile, Joey and Ross discover that theyre dating the same girl.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey is overjoyed to be nominated for a `Soapie, the third most prestigious award in daytime dramas. Meanwhile, engaged Monica frets when she realises she will never experience the thrill of a new relationship again, Ross spots Chandler sneaking out of a male strip club, and Phoebe meets a cute guy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Ross and Monicas Cousin
programme.desc: Monica is so perturbed by Chandlers instant attraction to her gorgeous visiting cousin that she persuades Ross to let her stay at his apartment. Despite being her blood relative, Ross cannot restrain himself from attempting to kiss her. She escapes to Phoebes apartment, but her beauty flabbergasts even Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Big Kiss
programme.desc: Rachel runs into an old sorority sister with whom she once shared a passionate encounter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: With only four weeks until their wedding, Monica and Chandler try to write their vows. Chandler enlists the boys help, while Monica does the same with the girls.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica convinces a reluctant Chandler to travel to Las Vegas to invite his estranged cross-dressing father to their wedding. Meanwhile, Rachel is furious that she is the only friend who Monica has not allowed to drive the Porsche that her father gave her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler And Monicas Wedding - Part 1
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler prepare for their wedding. Meanwhile, Joey is starring in a movie with a prestigious actor with a spitting problem.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler And Monicas Wedding - Part 2
programme.desc: Joey encounters problems trying to get off the movie set to officiate the wedding when the star turns up drunk.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Chandlers wedding reception is almost upstaged by the news that someone might be pregnant. Meanwhile, Ross tries to impress a pretty single woman, Chandler has troubles on the dance floor, and Joey hopes to impress Chandlers mums date - an important Broadway producer - with his acting ability.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Red Sweater
programme.desc: The girls speculate as to whos the father of Rachels baby, the guys scramble after Chandler loses the film from his wedding, and Monica wants to open the wedding gifts.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everybody seems to know who the father of Rachels baby is except the man himself. Meanwhile, Phoebe and Joey lie about a gas leak to get into Monica and Chandlers apartment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross and Rachels attempt to explain how they wound up in bed together quickly descends into an argument over who seduced who, until Ross shocks the room by announcing that he has the whole encounter on video. Meanwhile, Monica and Chandler return from their honeymoon, excited at the prospect of socialising with another just-married couple they met on the flight home.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross gets upset when Rachel goes out on a date with a handsome actor, Phoebe tries to prevent a chef from being sacked, and Chandler kills a co-workers promotion.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Halloween Party
programme.desc: At Monicas Halloween party, Phoebe meets the friendly fiance of her flighty twin Ursula, but becomes alarmed when she learns that her sister has misrepresented herself to her trusting future in-law.

programme.title: Lee Evans Live at Wembley
programme.desc: The loveable and breathtakingly brilliant physical comedian Lee Evans performs to an adoring crowd at Wembley Arena.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The off-colour adventures of a group of foul-mouthed elementary school boys in South Park, Colorado. The students, including, Eric Cartman, Stan Marsh, Kyle Broflovski and Kenny McCormick target every conceivable group in outrageous ways.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The citizens of South Park find out that suddenly internet is gone. When Randy hears that there could be some internet out in California, he packs up with his family and heads west.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Butters is sure hes seen a vampire at school but he cant get anyone to listen to him. His investigations lead him to think that maybe hed be better off as a Vampire.

programme.title: Mike Judges Beavis and Butt-Head
programme.desc: Middle-aged Beavis and Butt-Head join a church group, thinking it is a squad of soldiers going to war; a new kid joins Beavis and Butt-Heads class.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: A topical panel show based on a huge series of opinion polls carried out around Britain. These `Cat Polls are primed to root out the important issues of the day, like what is Britains most unwanted wedding gift or who the British public would most like to have round for dinner. Guests Claudia Winkelman, Kate Humble, David ODoherty and Nick Helm join host Jimmy Carr.

programme.title: Kiri Pritchard McLean: Home Truths
programme.desc: Kiri Pritchard-McLean is back and a lot has happened. Shes moved back to her home island of Anglesey and gotten some rescue chickens and jokes about skinny jeans, learning Welsh and more.

programme.desc: Jay Blades and the team bring four treasured family heirlooms, and the memories they hold, back to life. Painting conservator Lucia Scalisi welcomes a symbolic seascape painting into the barn. Owners Jenny and James sought solace on the Pembrokeshire seashore when they lost their baby son Elijah after only 37 days. For them, this painting of a rocky harbour and a rowing boat has come to symbolise the turbulent emotions they have encountered. Working on such a poignant painting is a huge responsibility for Lucia, but when the couple returns to see her restoration, they are utterly blown away. Bear ladies Amanda Middleditch and Julie Tatchell revive a dislocated doll belonging to Ana, who fled to the UK from Bosnia with her parents when she was a child. With mechanical maestro Steve Fletcher getting a head start on the dolls squiffy eye, the ladies turn their attention to making the baby doll more robust and a little less scary.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From Dirty Harry and The Godfather to the deeply imperfect gang from the Fast and the Furious franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Though the Nazis fail to open the gates of Hell, one little devil gets through. Raised at a secret FBI lab, Hellboy is a cigar-chomping, crimson demon with a breezeblock for a right hand and a gift for fighting otherworldly beasts. Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Loose-cannon cops Lowrey and Burnett reduce Miami to rubble as they try to stop Cuban and Russian drug smugglers from flooding Florida with ecstasy.

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the girl of his dreams gets kidnapped, a man turns his inability to feel pain into an unexpected advantage as he fights a bunch of thugs to get her back.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: The cynical commander of Allied Nations forces has to prevent a warlord from taking over the world. With 63 hostages held in his seemingly impregnable fortress, the warlord is demanding an outrageously hefty ransom.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean. With time running out, rescue diver Jonas Taylor must save the crew and the ocean itself from an unimaginable threat: a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark known as the megalodon.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The eponymous commando is coaxed out of retirement to act as a guide to a group of aid workers on a humanitarian mission in Burma. However, when the Burmese army captures the group, he mounts a violent one-man rescue mission to try to save the missionaries.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! and DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem in the Multiverse
programme.desc: The Super Hero Girls and the Teen Titans reluctantly band together to fight a new threat to the universe.

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
programme.desc: Batman and Robin have their hands full when Penguin, The Joker, Riddler and Catwoman join forces.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight assembles his heroic friends like Green Arrow and Nightwing to stop the Joker and his cronies from unleashing a diabolical computer virus.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A wildly imaginative seven-year-old boy discovers that his new brother, Boss Baby, is actually a spy on a secret mission, and only he can help thwart a dastardly plot that involves an epic battle between puppies and babies.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: Three emojis embark on an epic adventure through a smartphone to save their world from being deleted.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: 10 Lives
programme.desc: A pampered cat takes for granted the lucky hand he has been dealt after he is rescued and loved by Rose, a kind-hearted and passionate student. When he loses his ninth life, fate steps in to set him on a transformative journey.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! and DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem in the Multiverse
programme.desc: The Super Hero Girls and the Teen Titans reluctantly band together to fight a new threat to the universe.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Curious George is an inquisitive little monkey with an insatiable taste for adventure. Georges fun-loving enthusiastic nature endears him to new friends, but also lands him in a series of misadventures.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: Riverdance
programme.desc: An Irish boy and a Spanish girl journey into the mythical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure With Scientists
programme.desc: An inept swashbuckler decides to make an attempt to win the Pirate of the Year Award, and beat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz in a race to plunder the most booty. His journey takes him to Victorian London where the Pirate Captain must choose between winning Pirate of the Year, or helping his crew.

Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A young Viking with aspirations of becoming a dragon hunter befriends a young dragon himself and learns more about the creatures than he ever assumed.

programme.desc: An ordinary chameleon, Rango, winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in need of a new sheriff.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! and DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem in the Multiverse
programme.desc: The Super Hero Girls and the Teen Titans reluctantly band together to fight a new threat to the universe.

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
programme.desc: Batman and Robin have their hands full when Penguin, The Joker, Riddler and Catwoman join forces.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight assembles his heroic friends like Green Arrow and Nightwing to stop the Joker and his cronies from unleashing a diabolical computer virus.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A wildly imaginative seven-year-old boy discovers that his new brother, Boss Baby, is actually a spy on a secret mission, and only he can help thwart a dastardly plot that involves an epic battle between puppies and babies.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: Three emojis embark on an epic adventure through a smartphone to save their world from being deleted.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: 10 Lives
programme.desc: A pampered cat takes for granted the lucky hand he has been dealt after he is rescued and loved by Rose, a kind-hearted and passionate student. When he loses his ninth life, fate steps in to set him on a transformative journey.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! and DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem in the Multiverse
programme.desc: The Super Hero Girls and the Teen Titans reluctantly band together to fight a new threat to the universe.

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight assembles his heroic friends like Green Arrow and Nightwing to stop the Joker and his cronies from unleashing a diabolical computer virus.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Curious George is an inquisitive little monkey with an insatiable taste for adventure. Georges fun-loving enthusiastic nature endears him to new friends, but also lands him in a series of misadventures.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: Riverdance
programme.desc: An Irish boy and a Spanish girl journey into the mythical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure With Scientists
programme.desc: An inept swashbuckler decides to make an attempt to win the Pirate of the Year Award, and beat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz in a race to plunder the most booty. His journey takes him to Victorian London where the Pirate Captain must choose between winning Pirate of the Year, or helping his crew.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A young Viking with aspirations of becoming a dragon hunter befriends a young dragon himself and learns more about the creatures than he ever assumed.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A wildly imaginative seven-year-old boy discovers that his new brother, Boss Baby, is actually a spy on a secret mission, and only he can help thwart a dastardly plot that involves an epic battle between puppies and babies.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: An ordinary chameleon, Rango, winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in need of a new sheriff.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: The Death of Stalin
programme.desc: When dictator Joseph Stalin dies, his parasitic cronies square off in a frantic power struggle to become the next Soviet leader. As they bumble, brawl and back-stab their way to the top, the question remains -- just who is running the government?

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: After being kicked out of his apartment by his girlfriend, Steven hears that if he slips a cable guy $50, he can get hooked up with free cable - but at what further cost? Can Steven gently reject the cable guys insane attempts to be best buds and also get his girlfriend back?

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: Whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embark on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: A conflicted Navy pilot and veteran of the Second World War questions the role he is forced to play when he is called back into service for the Korean War.

programme.title: Mollys Game
programme.desc: Molly Bloom runs the worlds most exclusive high-stakes poker game for a decade before being arrested by the FBI. Her only ally is defence lawyer Charlie Jaffey, who learns that there is much more to Molly than the tabloids lead people to believe.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Barts successful stage musical based on Dickenss tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: The Portable Door
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Spoof spy caper with the eponymous, blundering hero attempting to recover the crown jewels and save Britain from an evil mastermind when all the other agents are killed. Promoted from lowly pen pusher to super spy, Johnny English is baffled when clues lead to respected entrepreneur Pascal Sauvage, but could the enigmatic Lorna hold the key to the mystery?

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Papa and the rest of the Smurfs reunite with their human friends to rescue Smurfette from the clutches of evil wizard Gargamel.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Barts successful stage musical based on Dickenss tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait
programme.desc: An American footballer is given the body of a wealthy industrialist after an inept angel prematurely claims his life.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In London during the swinging sixties, a promiscuous Cockney lad who lacks purpose or direction habitually seduces women and then moves on. When one of his girlfriends becomes pregnant, he refuses to marry her, preferring instead to carry on with more conquests, but eventually something happens which forces him to reconsider his shallow existence.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: High school oddball Ducky idolises his best friend Andie but shes smitten with wealthy classmate Blane who might be interested - if she wasnt so poor. Do the pair have a future together?

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: A cynical TV weatherman finds himself reliving the same day over and over again when he goes on location to the small town of Punxsutawney to film a report about their annual Groundhog Day. His predicament drives him to distraction, until he sees a way of turning the situation to his advantage.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Frustrated writer Jack Torrance takes a job as the winter caretaker at the ominous, mountain-locked Overlook Hotel so that he can write in peace. When he arrives there with his wife and son, they learn that the previous caretaker had gone mad. Slowly Jack becomes possessed by the evil, demonic presence in the hotel.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Classic chiller about the grisly goings-on in a remote motel run by a timid and decidedly odd young man and his domineering mother. The film totally changed Hollywoods perception of the horror genre and broke many of the movie industrys taboos.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: An ex-professional bowler and his talented Amish protege hustle their way across the country to a big-money tournament.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber

However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber

However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Geeky highschooler Sam Witwicky buys his first-ever car, hoping it will improve his chances with Mikaela. Imagine his surprise when his beat-down Camaro transforms into an alien robot called `Bumblebee and asks for his assistance in a deadly war.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honour needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

Stylish historical epic retelling the fierce battle at Thermopylae in 481BC. The Spartan king, Leonidas, and his tiny army of 300 followers provided inspiration for the whole of Greece as they fought the massed ranks of the Persian army whose commander, King Xerxes, had up to a million warriors at his disposal.

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Zombie Town
programme.desc: Two teens uncover a centuries-old secret when they decide to watch a zombie movie on Halloween night. However, when the townspeople themselves turn into the undead, they must track down an infamous filmmaker and break the curse before its too late.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Monolith
programme.desc: While trying to salvage her career, a disgraced journalist begins investigating a strange conspiracy theory. However, as the trail leads uncomfortably close to home, shes left to grapple with the lies at the heart of her own story.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Lovely, Dark, and Deep
programme.desc: A new back-country ranger travels alone through the dangerous wilderness, hoping to uncover the origins of a tragedy that has haunted her since she was a child.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: A science professor and his cohorts battle a slew of rapidly growing alien organisms that threaten to overrun the Earth.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers, young Furiosa gets caught in the crossfire of two tyrannical warlords. As the tyrants fight for dominance, Furiosa soon finds herself in a nonstop battle to make her way home.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: True Romance
programme.desc: Shop clerk Clarence falls for a prostitute, steals a fortune in cocaine and goes on the run, pursued by psychotic mobster Vincenzo.

programme.title: Mob Cops
programme.desc: When a retired NYPD detective writes a book about his familys ties to the mob, it ignites a firestorm between dirty cops working for a brutal crime boss and the officers trying to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A detective and a Secret Service agent investigate the abduction of a senators daughter from a school.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: When a feared contract killer refuses to murder a young blind woman on the orders of her handler, she finds herself hunted by old colleagues and a determined detective.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: Slick crime caper in which a thief, recently released from prison, rounds up a team of top criminals to rob three Las Vegas casinos owned by the man who is now dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: True Romance
programme.desc: Shop clerk Clarence falls for a prostitute, steals a fortune in cocaine and goes on the run, pursued by psychotic mobster Vincenzo.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: A hit man falls for his bosss wife when he is asked to escort her on a date, a boxer reneges on his promise to throw a big fight, and a couple attempt a heist that rapidly escalates out of control.

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E and an East European hitman.

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: An ageing Boston gangster tries to reconnect with his family and fix the mistakes from the past, but his criminal lifestyle soon threatens to destroy everything he holds dear.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: A troubled police officer is recruited by the FBIs chief investigator to help profile and track down a disturbed individual terrorising Baltimore, Maryland.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: Slick crime caper in which a thief, recently released from prison, rounds up a team of top criminals to rob three Las Vegas casinos owned by the man who is now dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: Casino mobster Benedict knows who stole his money and he wants it back. Danny and his crew of thieves have just two weeks to steal $190m, or their lives will be forfeit, but who is the mystery thief competing for the loot? This time Benedicts ex-girlfriend is on their side, even an integral part of the plan.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Based on three hybridising narrative strands, three groups of villains are intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Turkish and Tommy team up with a pugilistic Irish gypsy named Mickey for the purpose of rigging unlicensed boxing matches. However, their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. To complicate further, a New York gangster arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E and an East European hitman.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: The outwardly charming and intelligent psychopath Dr Lecter is in Florence, masquerading as a museum curator. A greedy cop discovers his true identity, and plans to hand him over to someone willing to pay, but things do not go to plan when female FBI agent Clarice Starling gets a call to help Lecters only living victim - the hideously deformed Mason Verger.

programme.sub-title: A Raccoon, A Ring and Four Rescues
programme.desc: When a tiny piece of trash ruins a racoons life, Dr Jessica cuts it free. However, Hope has to face tough decisions about its future.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: The team face a tough decision when Estis leg infection slows a young duikers release. They track and collar a young lion with DrAmanda, check on an ailing bush baby, and greet a noisy new addition to the centre: a grumpy grey parrot.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: A baby rhinos mother is illegally shot and Ol Pej staff have to calm the wild baby. Its not ideal to separate the calf from her mother, but the situation is dire, and the calf will have to be hand-raised.

programme.desc: Kenyas largest and busiest private game reserve including some of Africas rarest and most endangered species.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: A once-in-a-generation drought has sucked all the moisture from surrounding rivers and the Conservation team is struggling to keep up with the swath of thirsty creatures.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: Eco-tourism isnt just a background player in the operation of Ol Pej, its the financial backbone that keeps the park operating. From comfortable camping to ulta-luxurious accommodations, the guests that stay at Ol Pejeta live among nature.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Nerves run high as the team attempts a first: a surrogate mum for a newborn baby orang-utan. Meanwhile, in Hananyas group, Patricia is being pursued by the alpha male.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: The bachelor boys are up to their usual hooligan tricks, and Joline is struck down by a mystery illness. Elsewhere, stump-tailed macaque Koko is introduced to the great outdoors after 20 years in a pet-shop cage.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia
programme.desc: Chilema is an elephant with half a trunk after losing the tip to a poachers snare. The snares indiscriminate nature means other animals often fall foul of them. Chilema is now having to adapt to life without an elephants most important appendage.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: An in-depth look at the worlds biggest orangutan rescue centre continues. Alba is the only known albino orangutan in the world and the other orphans are not happy about their new classmate.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Stand by as rescue officers use a technique called flagging to nab a koala with dangerously inflamed eyes. Soothe burned possum feet with vet Tim, then shadow vet Karina as she examines a half-drowned platypus before referring him to a specialist.

programme.desc: Michael starts an audiotape murder-mystery game to distract staff from rumours of Dunder Mifflin filing for bankruptcy. Andy uses the games Southern flavour as cover to ask out Erin, but is unsure if she thinks its for real.

programme.desc: Marty Funkhouser is outraged when flowers from his mothers memorial are stolen, Larry complains about `sample abusers in stores, while Jeff and Susie find knowing Larry to be a liability when trying to get Sammy into an exclusive private school.

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
programme.desc: Larry regrets getting Cha Cha a job in his building when she monitors his bathroom habits. programme.desc: In taping himself speeding, a biker also ensures he gets arrested for his troubles. A women is arrested twice inside of one week for drug offences. programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.sub-title: Reno To The Napa Valley: Reversion
programme.desc: Beginning in the Silver State of Nevada, Michael takes to the skies over the dramatic Sierra Nevada mountain range. At Lake Tahoe, he hears of the first European explorer, known as `The Pathfinder, whose discovery opened up the west for settlement. Travelling on the historic Virginia and Truckee heritage line, Michael investigates the vast deposits of silver and gold ore on which Virginia City was built.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo heads to Chinatown to hear of the huge contribution Chinese immigrants made to the economy, working as miners and building the transcontinental railroad. He discovers an entrepreneurial community who overcame discrimination laid down by the law, and finds that fortune favours the brave with iconic Chinese treats created in America.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A rare Honda S800 sports car from 1967 takes Dereks fancy, and a couple of very different Ford Capris with long histories go head-to-head at the auction.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: The Mathewsons sell a 1958 Bedford D122 and a 1969 Vanden Plas Princess. They also meet a collector who may be willing to finally part with his huge hot hatch collection.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: With France fallen, the USA as yet uninvolved and the Russian pact with Hitler still in force, Britain stands all alone against the Germans forces across the English Channel.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts head to the Scottish borders for another busy day of valuations at Abbotsford, near Melrose, once the home of Sir Walter Scott. Objects under scrutiny include a bottle used by smugglers to fool the customs men, a miniature battle scene exquisitely hand cut by a prisoner during World War One, and a dinner service fit for a queen.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team set sail for the Channel Islands, where the people of Guernsey give them a warm welcome at Saumarez Park. Objects intriguing the experts include a piece of furniture used as target practice by the Germans during the occupation of the island, a giant sapphire once owned by a Maharajah, and a single bank note which turns out to be worth a fortune.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul sets out for County Durham in order to collect both a 1936 Singer Le Mans sports car and a pristine 1957 Lambretta LD 150. In the meantime, Derek gets his hands on a 1962 MGA MK2 Coupe.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek is reunited with the vehicle he took his driving test in, a 1957 Ford 100E Estate. Meanwhile, Paul heads north to collect a 50-year-old MGBGT that still smells like a new car.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: With France fallen, the USA as yet uninvolved and the Russian pact with Hitler still in force, Britain stands all alone against the Germans forces across the English Channel.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts head to the Scottish borders for another busy day of valuations at Abbotsford, near Melrose, once the home of Sir Walter Scott. Objects under scrutiny include a bottle used by smugglers to fool the customs men, a miniature battle scene exquisitely hand cut by a prisoner during World War One, and a dinner service fit for a queen.

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon Reeves journey around the spectacular Indian Ocean takes him from Oman to the Maldives. He starts in the remote and otherworldly Musandam peninsula on the Strait of Hormuz, one of the most strategically important waterways in the world, where oil from the Persian Gulf is shipped through the narrow channel out into the Indian Ocean. The journey takes him on to Mumbai, the Indian Oceans biggest port.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A super low mileage Renault Dauphine proves irresistible to the Resto team... But its 1959 mechanics ensure some hefty bills.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: The guys reckon that there is a big profit to be made when they track down a 1980s Austin Metro. Its unique in that its cheap, its clean and its bright yellow but can it help them treble their money?

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul sets out for County Durham in order to collect both a 1936 Singer Le Mans sports car and a pristine 1957 Lambretta LD 150. In the meantime, Derek gets his hands on a 1962 MGA MK2 Coupe.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Following his Appletons guide, Michael Portillo makes a trip to the jewel in the crown of Americas National Parks, Yosemite, to behold its towering granite cliffs, its giant sequoia trees and cascading waterfalls. He discovers how early conservationists fought to protect it in law and encounters a `buffalo soldier in the heart of the forest. In Berkeley, Michael uncovers a catastrophic event, which hit the city of San Francisco hard in 1906.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Steered by his late 19th-century Appletons guidebook, Michael Portillo continues through southern California aboard the Coast Starlight rail service. In the historic port of Monterey, Michael raises the Bear Flag of the one-time Republic of California and above it, the Stars and Stripes. He discovers the citys Spanish and Mexican heritage and traces how the former fishing port described as `stinking and decrepit in John Steinbecks novel, `Cannery Row, has become a beacon for tourists.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: There is a triple collection of desirable cars in store for Derek when an MG Midget, an Austin-Healey frogeye Sprite and an RS2000 come up for auction.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Daves son Jack is heading out to Cheshire to collect two cars with a 35-year age difference. And luckily for Mathewsons, Lucy knows exactly what has been brought in for auction.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: Hitler turns his tanks towards Russia. After a succession of devastating victories, the Germans delay fatally, and the fierce Russian winter takes a grip.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team arrive at Brooklands Motor Racing and Aviation Museum, near Weybridge in Surrey. Thousands flock to the paddocks, where the experts are on duty. Amongst the objects exciting their interest are a risque bust found abandoned in a garden, rare artefacts recording the Bluebird attempts to break world speed records, an old chest given away on the internet and valuable aboriginal tools.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts return to the Brooklands Motor Racing and Aviation Museum near Weybridge for another busy day of valuations. Objects brought before the cameras include a rare and highly valuable stirrup cup, books once owned by Churchill and rescued from a garden fire, and a remarkable bracelet given to Queen Victoria that was found in a gutter. Plus Fiona welcomes the return of a friendly Roadshow face.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dereks search for the unusual lands him a 1947 Lea Francis thats half-made of wood. Paul heads for the countryside to pick up a Morris one tonne truck.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave and Jack head to East Yorkshire to pick up a dusty Alfa Romeo and a 1930s Jowett. But Daves more taken with a possible Christmas present - a Carry On-style, bum-wobbling exercise machine.

Heading north to Bangladesh, Simon investigates one of the Indian Oceans fastest growing industries - providing prawns.

programme.desc: Ives is keen to be a part of Fletchers gambling enterprise, something Mackay is determined to stop, so when Fletcher rejects Ives, things go terribly wrong for Fletcher - or do they?
